import React from "react"; import Card from "./components/Card"; import tomato from './tomato.jpg' import ginger from './ginger.jpg' import onion from './onion.jpg' import { useState } from "react"; import './Shop.css' function Shop(){ const [displayStyle, setDisplayStyle] = useState('flex'); const Shop = ({ addToBasket }) => { // List of items (vegetables) available in the shop const items = [ { id: 1, name: 'Tomato', price: 100, description: 'Fresh Tomatoes', className: 'tomato' }, { id: 2, name: 'Ginger', price: 150, description: 'Fresh Ginger', className: 'ginger' }, { id: 3, name: 'Onion', price: 50, description: 'Fresh Onions', className: 'onion' }, ]; } return(

Produce

Fresh -

 October 9, 2024

) } export default Shop
